title: Multichain, Missing $120 Million Of Cryptocurrencies And Its CEO, Pulls The Plug
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Locked down exchange hacked. Missing founder holds keys to restarting buggy program.

title: AI And Blockchain Analytics: The Urgent Need For Crypto Privacy Tools
author: Gary Weinstein
description: As AI and blockchain analytics merge, the need for privacy tools like shielded transactions becomes vital in safeguarding users' personal information in the crypto world.

title: Crypto Usage Rises Across Argentina, Despite The Anti-Crypto IMF Deal
author: Javier Bastardo
description: Argentina has troubles with its IMF debt, but their openness to restrictive crypto policies might be helping them to regoneciate the deal.

title: From Hero To Zero: How Terra Was Toppled In Crypto’s Darkest Hour
author: Lawrence Wintermeyer
description: Sparked by the failure of Terra’s algorithmic stablecoin UST, a “death spiral” slashed the dollar-pegged asset to mere cents and saw the LUNA token hemorrhage 99 percent of its value. In crypto’s darkest hour LUNA’s demise has eclipsed Mt. Gox, BitConnect and the 2020 crash.

title: What Is Crypto?
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Crypto is a general term for the vast blockchain protocol ecosystem. Learn about what crypto is, and the various industries that are housed under its umbrella.

title: What Are Algorithmic Stablecoins?
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Stablecoins are digital assets designed to hold a certain value relative to a different asset, most commonly the U.S. dollar.

title: Maker Protocol Revenue Surges To A Two-Year High Of $165 Million
author: Javier Bastardo
description: Maker Protocol just hitted a revenue hight of $165 million and its stablecoin DAI has a market capitalizarion of over $5.57 billion. Here's what is happening.

title: Crypto Stalwart Maker Leads Real-World Asset Push
author: Eshita Nandini
description: Maker, among other decentralized finance protocols, is dedicating significant effort to the tokenization of real-world assets.

title: Crypto’s Great Reset: How Digital Asset Investors Will Recover From The Market’s $1 Trillion Meltdown
author: Michael del Castillo
description: The DAO’s implosion and the ICO crash set the groundwork for the growth of DeFi and cambrian explosion of DAOs today, and it is hard to imagine companies like Tesla buying bitcoin before Covid.

title: How SPOT By Ampleforth Could Become Digital Cash To Bitcoin's Digital Gold
author: Martin Leo Rivers
description: Bitcoin is not the “peer-to-peer electronic cash” envisioned by Satoshi Nakamoto. SPOT could be.

title: What You Need To Know About The Major Stablecoins In 2023
author: León Markovitz
description: Stablecoin usage continues to climb in 2023, with hundreds of thousands of users relying on these US dollar-pegged cryptocurrencies every day.

title: Hackers Steal Another $100 Million In Crypto From A Blockchain Transfer Protocol, Total Lost In 2022 Above $1 Billion
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Harmony’s Horizon bridge joins Ronin and Wormhole in exploited blockchain bridges in 2022, totaling $1 billion stolen.

title: What Are The 3 Different Types Of Cryptocurrencies?
author: Javier Bastardo
description: Bitcoin originated a new technological wave. Let's explore what has happened and what different cryptocurrencies are.

title: Billions Of FTX Assets In Limbo As Exchange Follows Voyager Into Bankruptcy
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Once the apparent savior of a rival, Sam Bankman-Fried’s conglomerate needs a hero of its own.

title: Abra Joins $152 Billion Stablecoin Market On Its Way To Becoming A Bank
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Following Binance’s playbook, the crypto brokerage will consolidate rival tokens with its new USD-A position.

title: Breaking The Buck: Stablecoins Depeg In Wake Of SVB And Silvergate Collapse
author: Jeff Gapusan
description: Popular stablecoins USD Coin And Dai Depeg In Wake Of SVB And Silvergate Collapse

title: DAI Instability Could Kill Ethereum’s Favorite Crypto-Backed Stablecoin
author: León Markovitz
description: MakerDAO’s DAI is the largest crypto-backed stablecoin in circulation. However, the stability of this popular stablecoin is far more precarious than most users realize.

title: A Conversation On CBDCs, With Jamiel Sheikh, Of CBDC Think Tank
author: Vipin Bharathan
description: A conversation with Jamiel Sheikh of the CBDC Think Tank

title: Stablecoin Issuers May Be Crypto Industry’s Achilles’ Heel
author: León Markovitz
description: When New York regulators ordered the crypto exchange Paxos to stop minting stablecoins this week, it revealed one of the Ethereum ecosystem’s greatest weaknesses: Fiat-backed stablecoin issuers that must obey laws in their respective jurisdictions.

title: The CEO Guide To The Metaverse
author: Ben Laker
description: Welcome to the metaverse. In this exciting new world, companies can interact with each other and customers in a completely virtual environment. The possibilities are endless, and the growth potential is vast. And as a CEO, you must be at the forefront of this new frontier

title: ‘Investors Ready To Pounce’—Crypto Now Braced For A $140 Billion Earthquake After Terra Luna-Led Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Solana, Cardano And Dogecoin Price Crash
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Research has shown there is $140 billion "ready to be deployed into bitcoin and altcoins" after the rapid growth of crypto’s four largest stablecoins by market cap...

title: Amid Collapse Of Signature, Silicon Valley Bank, Stablecoins Appear To Be Weathering The Storm (For Now)
author: Kamran Rosen
description: With the business world rocked by the recent closures of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank, the crypto world is left trying to determine how stable stablecoins really are.

title: Are U.S. Crypto Regulators Staking Out Territory Via Enforcement Actions?
author: Jason Brett
description: As regulatory enforcement actions unfold between the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), the latter just subtly claimed Ethereum (ETH) and DAI, a stablecoin backed by other crypto tokens, as digital commodities.

title: US Treasury Sanctioning Tornado Cash Unleashes ‘Max Chaos’ In The Crypto Universe
author: Eric Mack
description: Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) added Tornado Cash and 45 associated Ethereum wallet addresses to its Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons (SDN) list, which includes individuals or companies tied to sanctioned nations, as well as suspected terrorists.

title: Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, DeFi Tokens Fall - Bitcoin Holds Key Support Ahead Of Options Expiry
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Ethereum and its competitors dropped Thursday as investors continued to shed perceived risker digital assets. Bitcoin is holding stay above a key support level.

title: Innovative Crypto Stablecoins- Still At Infancy And Experiencing Growing Pains
author: Roomy Khan
description: Recent monetary policy tightening have triggered steep declines in many financial markets, including crypto assets which have lost almost $1 trillion in market capitalization in just one week.
